properties.comment: Linked data queries for habitat types
properties.entry: Files delivered through Reportnet with relevance to this habitat type.
Ranges for this habitat type reported under Article 17, Habitats Directive

Assessments on the conservation status of the habitat types and species of Community interest have been carried out in EU 25 for the period 2001-2006, compiled as part of the Habitats Directive - Article 17 reporting process. The data summary sheet for habitat type conservation status provides an overview per biogeographical region.
Data collected by the European Commission and ETC/BD in 2002 and 2005
Crosswalk from EUNIS habitat types to phytosociological syntaxa
The European Vegetation Survey developed an overview of European vegetation units, syntaxa, providing a standardising tool in classifying vegetation types across Europe.
